Package ohos.agp.components

Class IndexBar

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.agp.components.Component
      • ohos.agp.components.IndexBar

  • public class IndexBar
extends Component
    Represents a circular index bar that supports UI operations.

    This class is applicable to an IndexBar instance, for example, the contact list on a smart watch.

    Since:
    3

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      static interface  IndexBar.OnSelectedListener
      Callback to listen for and index change events of a index bar.

        Parameters:
        context - Indicates the application context.
        attrSet - Indicates the attribute set of the index bar. For details, see AttrSet.

        Parameters:
        context - Indicates the application context.
        attrSet - Indicates the attribute set of the index bar. For details, see AttrSet.
        styleName - Indicates the style to use.

    • Method Detail

      • setIndexRadius

        public void setIndexRadius​(float radius)
        Sets the radius for an index bar.
        Parameters:
        radius - Indicates the radius of the index bar.
        Since:
        3

      • getIndexRadius

        public float getIndexRadius​()
        Obtains the radius of this index bar. The index bar is actually ring-shaped; the radius refers to the distance from the center of the circle to the midpoint of the ring.
        Returns:
        Returns the radius.
        Since:
        4

      • setIndexPaint

        public void setIndexPaint​(Paint paint)
        Sets a paint for drawing a circle on an index bar.
        Parameters:
        paint - Indicates the paint to set for drawing a circle on the index bar.
        Since:
        3

        Parameters:

        paint - Indicates the paint used to draw the index string.
        Since:
        3

      • setIndexBarExpandedStatus

        public void setIndexBarExpandedStatus​(boolean expanded)
        Sets whether the index bar is expanded. By default, the index bar is in the collapsed state.
        Parameters:
        expanded - Indicates the status of IndexBar. True indicates the IndexBar is expanded; False indicates the IndexBar is collapsed.
        Since:
        4

      • getIndexBarStatus

        public int getIndexBarStatus​()
        Obtains the status of IndexBar.
        Returns:
        Returns the status of IndexBar. 0 indicates the index bar has been collapsed; 1 indicates the index bar is being expanded; 2 indicates the index bar is being collapsed; 3 indicates the index bar has been expanded.
        Since:
        4

      • getSelectedCount

        public int getSelectedCount​()
        Obtains the index number of the string displayed on an index bar.
        Returns:
        Returns the number shown in the center.
        Since:
        3

      • setMaxCount

        public void setMaxCount​(int maxCount)
        Sets the maximum number of indexes on this index bar.
        Parameters:
        maxCount - Indicates the maximum number of indexes to set.The maxcount value range must in [30,40], otherwise, the setting does not take effect. since 4

      • setMinCount

        public void setMinCount​(int minCount)
        Sets the minimum number of indexes on this index bar.
        Parameters:
        minCount - Indicates the minimum number of indexes to set. The value must be less than the value of maxCount to ensure that the setting can take effect.
        Since:
        4

      • getMinCount

        public int getMinCount​()
        Obtains the minimum number of indexes on this index bar.
        Returns:
        Returns the minimum number of indexes.
        Since:
        4

      • setMinCountAndMaxCount

        public void setMinCountAndMaxCount​(int minCount,
                                   int maxCount)
        Sets the maximum and minimum numbers of indexes on this index bar.
        Parameters:
        minCount - Indicates the minimum number of indexes to set,and the value must be greater than or equal to 1 and less than max, otherwise, the setting does not take effect.
        maxCount - Indicates the maximum number of indexes to set,and the value range must in [30,40], otherwise, the setting does not take effect.
        Since:
        4
